name: Hilton Dublin Airport
address: Northern Cross, Malahide Rd, Dublin 17, Irlande, Dublin
description: Hilton Dublin Airport is a contemporary 4-star hotel just 20 minutes from Dublin city center with convenient access to Dublin Airport via the hotel's airport shuttle service, which is complimentary to all guests of the hotel. With secure underground parking, this Dublin hotel offers flexible meeting rooms for up to 350 guests, with WiFi and breakout rooms. The spacious meeting facilities are bright, with natural daylight, and offer adjustable heating and air conditioning. The hotel offers a relaxing atmosphere for guests to unwind whilst delivering all of the required business facilities for a top-class experience. Choose from a variety of guest rooms, including upgraded deluxe rooms, family rooms, and suites. Large soundproof windows offer plenty of light without any noise and a choice of thoughtful amenities are available, including WiFi access, a work desk, a laptop safe, and large flat-screen TV. Keep fit at the fully equipped Hilton Fitness Gym with cardiovascular and strength training equipment. Feast on succulent steaks and seafood at the hotel restaurant, Burnells, or unwind with an evening drink and a light meal in the bar where you can choose from plenty of local beers and spirits.Hilton

name: Clarendon
address: 43 Watermeadow Park, Old Bawn, Tallaght, Tallaght
description: The property is set in Tallaght, just a 7-minute walk from The Square Tallaght and 1.9 km from National Basketball Arena. At the bed and breakfast, every room is equipped with a wardrobe, and a flat-screen TV. Two rooms have private bathrooms and 2 rooms have a shared bathroom. A continental breakfast is available daily at the property. Clarendon is a 10-minute walk to Shamrock Rovers Football Stadium, and a 15-minute walk to The Hospital. Guests can reach IT Tallaght within a 20-minute walk. The property is 10 km from Dublin city centre. Guests can avail of local buses (54a, 49, 65, 65b, 77a, 56a) and tram (luas redline) to city centre. The nearest airport is Dublin Airport, 18 km from Clarendon.

name: Mulgrave Lodge
address: Dun Laoghaire, Co Dublin 47 Mulgrave Street, Dún Laoghaire
description: Set in Dun Laoghaire in the Dublin County region, Mulgrave Lodge offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. A vegetarian breakfast is available every morning at the bed and breakfast. Guests at Mulgrave Lodge can enjoy cycling nearby, or make the most of the garden. Sandycove Beach is 2.2 km from the accommodation, while RDS Venue is 8.2 km away. The nearest airport is Dublin Airport, 23 km from Mulgrave Lodge.

name: Aberdeen Lodge
description: No description found

name: Fitzpatrick Castle Hotel
description: The Fitzpatrick Castle Dublin Hotel overlooks Dublin Bay and is a 20-minute drive from Dublin. It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi, a pool and 2 award winning restaurants. The rooms at the Fitzpatrick Castle Dublin Hotel feature en suite bathrooms and satellite TVs. They also include hairdryers, telephones and tea/coffee making facilities. The AA Rosette PJ’s Restaurant serves fine food and The Mapas restaurant features fresh local produce. The leisure centre has a whirlpool spa, a 20 metre indoor heated swimming pool, a Scandinavian wood sauna and a steam room. There is also a fully equipped gym. Please note that all guests are required to wear a swimming cap while in the pool, pool caps are available to purchase from our Fitness centre reception. Children are welcome in the swimming pool and reception can give you a copy of specific swimming times for children. There is a DART station 10 minutes away which services Dublin. The James Joyce Museum and Dalkey Castle are both within one mile and free parking is available at the Fitzpatrick. Dublin airport is 43 km from the property.

name: Anantara The Marker Dublin
address: Grand Canal Square, Docklands,2, Dublin D02 CK38
description: Anantara The Marker Dublin Hotel is conveniently located just 25 minutes’ drive from Dublin Airport. This five star hotel is also close to tourist attractions, key business districts, the 3 Arena and Aviva Stadium making it a perfect base for business and leisure travelers. With views across Grand Canal Square and Dublin’s Docklands, the hotel offers 187 contemporary rooms and suites equipped with Irish-designed furnishings. Nespresso machines, king-size beds and complimentary Wi-Fi come as standard. A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel restaurant, The Brasserie, daily from 06.30 am, giving business guests plenty of time to get to the office. Gluten-free, vegetarian and children’s options are always available. The hotel’s dining options include local and international dishes prepared with locally sourced produce, with snacks, meals and drinks available in the hotel restaurant, The Marker Bar or at the stunning wraparound Rooftop Bar and Terrace. Meetings, special events and civil weddings can be held in the hotel’s well-equipped events spaces, with capacity for up to 350 guests. Those staying at the hotel enjoy complimentary access to the well-equipped gym and 23 meter indoor infinity pool, as well as being able to book relaxing treatments at the hotel spa.NH Hoteles

name: Clontarf Castle Hotel
description: Set in an 11th-century castle the Clontarf Hotel combines ancient architecture with 21st-century facilities. 10 minutes’ from Dublin city centre, this boutique hotel offers an award-winning restaurant and luxurious bedrooms. Rooms at the Clontarf Castle Hotel feature air-conditioning, LCD satellite TVs and free Wi-Fi. There is a 24-hour room service menu and beds have pillow-top mattresses. The Fahrenheit Grill serves fine cuisine and specialises in local beef and fish dishes. The Knights Bar has ornate ceilings, huge open fireplaces and stained glass windows. The Indigo Lounge, with its stylish sofas and red chandeliers, serves morning coffee, afternoon tea and an excellent selection of wines. There is a bus stop outside of the Castle with regular services to the city centre.

name: The Bonnington Dublin
description: With an indoor swimming pool and hot tub bath, Bonnington Dublin is less than 10 minutes’ drive from Dublin Airport. Its rooms include plasma-screen TVs. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. Free to all guests, the Bonnington Dublin Spa offers a well-equipped gym, sauna and a steam room. A range of beauty and pamper treatments is available for an extra charge, including hot stone massage, Indian head massage and facials. Bright with contemporary furnishings, each bedroom includes a private bathroom, 39-inch flat-screen TV, safe, tea/coffee making facilities and salon-style hairdryerand some offer city views. Executive rooms offer extra space and individual climate control. Bonnington Dublin is just a 10-minute drive from Dublin city centre and a 15-minute walk from Croke Park Stadium. The O2 arena is only 15 minutes away by car.

name: The Old Borough Hotel - Wetherspoon
description: Featuring a garden and a terrace, The Old Borough Hotel - Wetherspoon is located in Swords, a 10-minute drive from Dublin Airport and a 1-minute walk from Swords Castle. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a bar. The property is set 2.3 km from Art Alley. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Staff at The Old Borough Hotel - Wetherspoon are always available to provide advice at the reception. National Show Centre is 2.5 km from the accommodation.

name: The Croke Park Hotel
description: Opposite Croke Park Stadium, this luxury 4-star hotel boasts rooms with 50-inch Smart TVs. On site parking is available (subject to availability and additional charge). Each room at Croke Park Hotel features beds with duck down duvets, and a private bathroom with deluxe toiletries. Rooms also features a free Wi-Fi. The Sideline serves European cuisine made with fresh ingredients, with chefs cooking from centre stage in an open kitchen. Guests can also enjoy fresh coffee and pastries at the coffee bar. Dublin Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away, while the National Botanic Gardens are a 25-minute walk. Connolly Metro Station is 15 minutes’ walk, while Trinity College Dublin can be reached in 25 minutes on foot.

name: Radisson Blu St. Helen's Hotel, Dublin
description: Set within 4 acres of beautiful private gardens, the luxury Radisson Blu St. Helen's Hotel offers spacious and luxurious rooms. Guests can relax and enjoy a choice of 6 dining areas offering garden views and 2 outdoor garden terraces. The hotel is located in the historic St Helen’s estate, a 10-minute drive from Dublin city centre. Elegant rooms at Radisson Blu St Helen’s Hotel offer wonderful views over the extensive gardens. Cosy beds feature Egyptian cotton sheets and duck down duvets, while private bathrooms include a hair-dryer. Guests can relax with in-room movies, complimentary Wi-Fi and parking, 26-inch LCD TVs and a mini bar. Set in a unique Victorian conservatory, The Orangerie Bar and Ballroom Lounge offers impressive views, serving afternoon teas and light lunches. The award-winning Talavera Restaurant serves Italian specialties by candlelight. Guests can exercise with free access to the hotel's modern fitness suite. The Radisson Blu St. Helen’s Hotel is just 18 kilometres from Dublin International Airport, and the hotel is serviced by the Aircoach transfer bus. There is a D.A.R.T. rapid railway station less than a mile away, offering access to Dublin centre in 15 minutes.

name: Intercontinental Dublin, An IHG Hotel
description: Immerse in the splendour of InterContinental Dublin. Our five-star urban resort boasting 215 luxurious rooms and suites, set on two garden acres in the affluent Ballsbridge neighbourhood, is renowned for its elegant guestrooms, breathtaking views, and award-winning spa. Indulge in curated culinary experiences or host your own conference or gala in our elegant meeting & event space. The hotel is within walking distance to the city centre, and minutes from Aviva Stadium, Trinity College and more.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Conrad Dublin
description: The award-winning Conrad Dublin is located at the heart of the city, standing moments from the gardens of St Stephen's Green and overlooking the majestic National Concert Hall. Heavily inspired and influenced by Dublin's rich literary culture and local heritage, Conrad Dublin features 192 beautifully refurbished guest rooms and suites. Join us on a voyage of discovery at Lemuel's, relax and enjoy a tasty meal in The Terrace Kitchen & Social House or take a seat in the stylish surroundings of Anna Haugh at Conrad Dublin, and experience a modern Irish fine dining experience. The hotel's fitness center is equipped with state-of-the-art cardio machines and weights, and the jogging routes around the picturesque St Stephen's Green are also yours to be enjoyed. Conrad Dublin's prestigious Ballroom and 9 conference rooms make it the perfect venue to host your bespoke event, with a capacity of up to 350 guests. The unique and impressive Iveagh Suite is the ultimate venue for exclusive gatherings, combining recent restoration with cutting-edge technology to guarantee a lasting impression on your guests. By placing the very latest state-of-the-art equipment at your fingertips as standard: you have the opportunity to convene with confidence.Hilton

name: The Westbury Hotel
description: The luxurious 5-star Westbury Hotel has spacious and sumptuously furnished bedrooms with en suite bathrooms. On Dublin’s Grafton Street, the Westbury has fantastic restaurants, a bar and a fitness suite. Each immaculate room has Sealy beds, Lissadell linen, and Aromatherapy Associates bathroom products. They also feature LCD TVs and an iPod compatible music system. There are 2 superb restaurants offering contemporary dining, while The Gallery, with its view across Grafton Street, serves afternoon tea. The glamorous Sidecar Bar has a fine cocktail menu. Positioned between Trinity College and St Stephen’s Green, the Westbury is close to all Dublin’s attractions. Temple Bar, Dublin Castle and the Gaiety Theatre are all within a 5-minute walk. Wired internet is available in rooms and Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. On-site parking is available.

name: Clayton Hotel Charlemont
description: Overlooking the Grand Canal in Dublin 2, Clayton Hotel Charlemont boasts a shared lounge, Red Bean Roastery, Lockside Bar/Social and Gaudens Restaurant. The hotel is an 8-minute walk from St. Stephen's Green and is located a short distance from attractions such as Grafton Street, Bord Gais Energy Theatre and The Gaiety Theatre. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. A breakfast is available in the mornings. This city centre hotel will also have a ground floor with a bar, a restaurant and Red Bean Roastery coffee dock. Staff at the 24-hour front desk are provided. St Patrick's Cathedral is an 11-minute walk from Clayton Hotel Charlemont, while National Museum of Ireland - Archaeology is a 12-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Dublin Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Marine Hotel
address: Sutton Cross, Dublin 13, Ireland, Dublin Dublin 13
description: The Marine Hotel is a 5-minute walk from the beach and has rooms with views over Dublin Bay. It offers Cucinos, an authentic Italian restaurant, an indoor pool, sauna, meeting and banquet facilities and free parking. There is free WiFi access in all areas. Located in Sutton Cross, the Hotel Marine is a 5-minute walk from Sutton DART Station. It provides regular services to Dublin which can be reached in under 10-minutes. Room at the Marine feature TVs with satellite channels, hairdryers and Wi-Fi access. Rooms have baths and showers and most have sea views. Lunch is served in the Galley Cavery and Schooner’s Bar offers a bar menu and drinks all day. The Pangaea Spa is opposite the hotel and offers a wide range of treatments. Portmarnock Golf Course and North Bull Island are both within a 5-minute drive from the Marine.

name: Glashaus Hotel
address: Belgard Square West, Tallaght, Dublin 24, Ireland, Tallaght Dublin 24
description: Just 13km from the centre of Dublin, Glashaus Hotel in Tallaght features impressive modern styling and offers all-day dining in the Café Bar. The hotel provides free secure parking and WiFi and is a 4-minute walk from The Square Shopping Centre. All 48 rooms at Glashaus Hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV, telephone, safe, ironing and tea and coffee facilities. Each has a luxurious bed, an elegant marble-floored bathroom with a bath and shower, and a hairdryer and toiletries are also provided. Osten Square Bar/Restaurant offers European and Irish cuisine with fine wines, spirits and cocktails in stylish surroundings with LED TVs. Phoenix Park is a 15-minute drive from Glashaus Hotel and home to Dublin Zoo, and the Guinness Storehouse attraction is a similar distance away. Tallaght’s Civic Theatre provides regular live entertainment just 10 minutes’ walk away, and LUAS trams provide direct services to the city centre close to this hotel.

name: Harveys Guest House
description: No description found

name: The Merrion
description: Italian marble bathrooms, a restaurant with 2 Michelin stars, and an infinity pool are offered at this award-winning 5-star hotel. In Dublin’s centre, the Georgian building features beautiful landscaped gardens Spacious and sumptuously furnished with Georgian decor, each room at The Merrion features city or garden views. Guests can relax in cosy bathrobes with luxury toiletries in the bathroom. Rooms offer a flat-screen satellite TV, a refrigerator, and a minibar. Awarded 2 prestigious Michelin stars, Restaurant Patrick Guilbaud serves gourmet fine cuisine with a French influence overlooking the gardens. The Cellar Restaurant offers Irish cuisine, while No. 23 serves stylish and creative cocktails. The Tethra Spa features luxurious spa and beauty treatments, a fully equipped, modern gym, and an Italian marble steam room. The Merrion is located between Merrion Square Park and St. Stephen’s Green. Trinity College Dublin is 10-minute walk away, while the National Gallery of Ireland is just a 5-minute walk. Grafton Street is just 10 minutes’ walk away, while vibrant Temple Bar is 20 minutes away on foot.

name: The Morgan Hotel
description: In the Temple Bar area, The Morgan Hotel has luxurious rooms near Trinity College. Guests can enjoy free WiFi. Each luxury room at the Morgan Hotel features elegant furniture, a flat-screen TV, air-conditioning, Nespresso machine and an en-suite bathroom with monsoon power shower. A SuitePad is also featured in the room. The restaurant and bar offers a contemporary dining experience and city-famous cocktails. A concierge and room service is available 24 hours. The Morgan Hotel is just a short stroll from Grafton Street, Dublin's main shopping area, and Dublin Castle.

name: Talbot Hotel Stillorgan
address: Stillorgan Road, Stillorgan, Dublin 18, Island, Dublin 18
description: On the edge of Dublin’s centre, this hotel features fitness facilities and rooms with free WiFi. It offers an AA Rosette restaurant, and University College Dublin is just 10 minutes’ drive away. The bright rooms at Talbot Hotel Stillorgan all include a private, marble bathroom with fluffy towels and a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy a flat-screen TV, free tea and coffee, and 24-hour room service in every room. The award-winning Purple Sage Restaurant provides many hidden alcoves and quiet areas. It serves a wide variety of cuisine and an extensive wine list. The Air Coach from Dublin Airport stops directly outside the hotel, and Dublin’s centre can be reached in a 15-minute drive, with buses stopping near to the hotel. Leopardstown Racecourse is just a 5-minute drive away.

name: Hillview House
description: No description found

name: Plaza Hotel Tallaght
description: This Plaza Hotel is a 4-star hotel in the heart of Tallaght, on the foothills of the Dublin Mountains, just off Belgard Road, beside The Square Shopping Centre. Named after the many trees in the locality, Alder Café Bar is located on the ground floor, with direct access from the main car park. The hotel offers 122 ensuite bedrooms along with a number of suites. Two event spaces, together with 4 meeting suites allow for conferences and events of all sizes, ranging from 5-200 people. Alder Café Bar is new all day dining outlet, serving food and beverage daily. Mills Restaurant is located on the first floor of the hotel, and boasts views of the Dublin and Wicklow mountains! There is a Luas tram situated 5 minutes’ walk away, which takes less than 30 minutes to reach the city centre. The Plaza Hotel Tallaght is 1 km from the M50 motorway, 5 km from the Dundrum Shopping Centre and a 20-minute drive from Liffey Valley Shopping Centre.

name: Castleknock Hotel
description: Offering an 18-hole golf course and a restaurant, The Castleknock Hotel is 15 minutes’ drive from Dublin city centre, and 6 km from Phoenix Park. Dublin Airport is 25-minutes' drive away. Guests can enjoy luxurious bedrooms. A modern hotel with contemporary decor and furnishings, the 190 bedrooms at the Castleknock Hotel feature flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. Bathrooms have power showers, bathtubs and under-floor heating. The Earth & Vine Restaurant offers a farm-to-fork style dining experience. The 22 Bar & Restaurant offers a casual dining experience and a menu with modern twists on Italian food. The Lime Tree Bar offers a relaxed atmosphere and guests can also enjoy a drink on the sun terrace. Guests can use the onsite leisure centre which includes a swimming pool, gym and spa which offers Elemis and Voya signature treatments. The hotel has meeting rooms and can cater for conference groups. There are good public transport links nearby. Free parking is available at the Castleknock Hotel.

name: Aloft Dublin City
address: 1 Mill Street, The Liberties, Dublin D08 XK58
description: Modern travelers choose Aloft Dublin City. With unbeatable placement in the heart of The Liberties, one of Dublin's oldest and most historic areas, and a range of perks, our 4-star hotel is ideal for both business and leisure travelers to Ireland. From our vivid, contemporary facade, to our cutting-edge design elements to our ultra-modern in-room technology, our 4-star hotel was meant to stand out from the crowd. Indulge in creative international fare at Tenters Gastro Pub with live music or enjoy monthly acoustic performances and perfectly poured cocktails at the rooftop W XYZ Bar. Families can have fun in our TeePee themed Camp Aloft bedroom and guests can recharge at our gym. For those seeking a memorable venue for an intimate business gathering, we offer modern, flexible venue space, full-service planning, and catering. Thanks to our hotel's ideal location, you'll have no trouble exploring attractions like Guinness Storehouse, 3 Arena, St. Patrick's Cathedral and Temple Bar.Marriott

name: West County Hotel
address: Lucan Road, Chapelizod, Dublin 20, Ireland, Dublin 20
description: This family run hotel is only 6.5 km from Dublin City Centre. It offers free car parking, free Wi-Fi access and full Irish Breakfasts. The bright and spacious bedrooms are all en suite, and feature a TV, work desk, iron, and a selection of toiletries. The award-winning Pine Restaurant serves delicious evening meals, and the hotel also features a bar and lounge area complete with a large bar menu selection. The hotel is situated next door to Europe’s largest public park, The Phoenix Park. A bus stop is situated just outside the hotel for regular trips to and from Dublin City Centre.

name: Crowne Plaza Dublin - Blanchardstown
description: Relax at our award-winning Crowne Plaza® Dublin - Blanchardstown hotel near Dublin Airport. Visit the Dublin City Centre, just a 20-minute drive away, or take advantage of our location near major companies, including Xerox, IBM, and eBay, perfect for business travellers. Explore top attractions such as Blanchardstown Shopping Centre, Phoenix Park, Emerald Park, and the Dublin City Centre. You can also enjoy international rugby and Republic of Ireland football in the striking Aviva Stadium nearby. Plan your meetings in our expansive meeting space or savour a delicious evening drink in our Sanctuary Bar. Crowne Plaza® Dublin - Blanchardstown has everything you need for a successful stay.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Lucan Spa Hotel
description: The family-run Lucan Spa Hotel is located on the N4, just off the M50, 15 minutes’ from Dublin Airport and 20 minutes’ from Dublin city centre. The Lucan Spa Hotel offers spacious and comfortable rooms. These luxurious rooms all have en suite bathrooms and satellite TV. Wireless internet access is available throughout the hotel. The Earl Bistro serves breakfast in the morning and a lunchtime carvery menu. The charming Hanora D Restaurant has an evening a la carte menu, whilst The Ballynetty Bar offers bar food. A wide range of amenities including a cinema, shopping centres, a swimming pool, canoeing and golf are all only a short distance from The Lucan Spa Hotel

name: Bracken Court Hotel
address: 1 Bridge Street Balbriggan Co. Dublin, Balbriggan
description: The 4-star Bracken Court Hotel is located in the picturesque village of Balbriggan, 30 minutes’ drive from Dublin’s centre. It offers free parking, free Wi-Fi, and free newspapers, as well as spacious rooms with marble bathrooms and power showers. The modern rooms at the Bracken Court are decorated in warm colours with comfortable Respa beds and crisp, white linen. They include free Wi-Fi, cable TV, ironing equipment, tea/coffee making facilities and a 24-hour room service menu. The Bracken Grill is a steak and seafood restaurant which serves fresh food, while the traditional Irish pub, Jack Doyle's Bar, offers a bar food menu as well as a wide variety of beers, wines, spirits and cocktails. Beautiful Balbriggan Beach and its traditional fishing harbour is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Dublin Airport is just 20 minutes away by car, and free parking is available. Dublin’s centre can be reached by train, with Balbriggan Station just a 5-minute walk away.

name: Aspect Hotel Dublin Park West
address: Park West Business Park, Nangor Road 12, Dublin
description: Aspect Hotel Park West is located over 6 km from Dublin city centre and a 5-minute drive from the M50 motorway, near the Naas Road exit. Park West Train Station is just opposite the hotel. There is a regular service to and from the city centre, and journey time is only 12 minutes. The hotel is situated in the award-winning Park West Business Campus and is close to all other major road networks. The Luas overground transport service is located just 2 km from the hotel, and the Direct Dublin bus is located directly outside. Willow Restaurant serves a delicious selection of hot food, snacks and beverages all day. All ground-floor areas and guest rooms are equipped with free wireless internet access as standard.

name: Portmarnock Hotel & Golf Links
description: Tucked away in a quiet corner of ‘The Velvet Strand’, one of Ireland’s most stunning stretches of uninterrupted coastline - the historic Portmarnock Resort & Jameson Golf Links, once the family home of the Jameson Dynasty awaits. With an award-winning Links Golf Course, and Spa and the historic Jameson Bar, Portmarnock Resort & Jameson Golf Links is the perfect coastal retreat. The hotel combines modern elegance with the grandeur of a 19th-century residence, previously owned by member of the Jameson Whiskey dynasty, now home to the famous Jameson Bar. Rooms at the Portmarnock Resort & Jameson Golf Links all have views of either, the ocean, gardens or golf course. Rooms also include internet access, and tea/coffee-making facilities and much more. Designed by Bernard Langer, The Portmarnock Links has been open for play since 1995. It is an exceptional course that offers just the right degree of challenge, superb views and relaxed atmosphere. The hotel is only 15 minutes from Dublin Airport and 30 minutes from Dublin city centre. Portmarnock, where the only thing overlooked is the sea.

name: The Fitzwilliam Hotel
description: In central Dublin, The 5-star Fitzwilliam Hotel offers luxurious accommodation. Guests can enjoy the restaurant and bar There is a gym, and the hotel’s interior design is by Sir Terence Conran. Rooms have baths and power showers, anti-mist mirrors, luxurious bathrobe, slippers and Murdock toiletries. They also feature LCD TVs, iPod compatible music systems and free internet connections. The property's bar, Inn on the Green, is available at the property. Glovers Alley Restaurant offers a menu with a French influence, and overlooks St Stephen's Green. The gym is equipped with modern equipment whilst the Spirit Treatment rooms offer many treatments including pedicures, massages and nail work. The city’s Temple Bar area is just a 5-minute stroll away, as is Trinity College. The Fitzwilliam is just 6 miles from Dublin Airport and Heuston Train Station is 1.5 miles away.

name: Louis Fitzgerald Hotel
address: Newland's Cross, Exit 1A Naas Road, Dublin 22, Dublin D22 X5N7
description: Louis Fitzgerald Hotel is situated in Dublin and provides recently renovated rooms and free wireless internet. It also offers free public parking on site and is a 10-minute drive from Citywest. This modern hotel provides babysitting/child services, luggage storage and a 24-hour reception. Additionally, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide local information. Every room at Louis Fitzgerald Hotel includes ironing facilities and cable/satellite channels, and the bathrooms feature showers and hair dryers. All offer a radio, a telephone and a desk. Those staying at Louis Fitzgerald Hotel can indulge in a beverage at L.J's Bar, after enjoying a meal at LJ's Restaurant. Breakfast is available daily and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. 3Arena, Dublin Zoo and Dublin Airport are around a 20-minute car ride from Louis Fitzgerald Hotel. Christ Church Cathedral and O'Connell Street are just a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Carlton Hotel Blanchardstown
address: Church Road, Tyrrelstown, Blanchardstown, Dublin 15, Ireland, Dublin
description: The 4-star Carlton Hotel is 5 miles from Dublin Airport and just a 5-minute drive from Blanchardstown and Blanchardstown Shopping Centre. It has a fine restaurant, luxurious rooms and free parking. The large rooms at the hotel feature flat-screen TVs and free WiFi. They also include safety deposit boxes and some rooms have executive lounge and library access. The modern restaurant serves international cuisine and overlooks the hotels landscaped gardens. Relax over a coffee, light lunch or cocktail in the stylish Hourglass Bar. A variety of breakfasts are served daily. There is a 24-hour room service menu available. The National Aquatic Centre and Westmanstown Golf Club are both within 2 miles of the The 4-star Carlton. The M50 is close by and Dublin city centre is less than 10 miles away.

name: Rochestown Lodge Hotel
description: Rochestown Lodge Hotel and Leisure centre is a 3-star hotel located in Dun Laoghaire, just a short distance from Dublin City Centre and has easy access to the M50 motorway. All guest rooms are spacious and comfortable offering cable TV, complimentary WiFi and tea/coffee making facilities. The Restaurant & Bar offer nutritious, contemporary dishes daily. The Hotel offers a 15-metre swimming pool, hydrotherapy pool, hot tub and sauna. The restaurant serves local traditional dishes while the bar offers live entertainment at weekends. There is a Dublin bus stop directly outside the hotel. Free secure underground parking is provided.

name: Henrietta Suites City Centre
description: Located less than 1 km from St. Michan's Church and a 10-minute walk from Jameson Distillery in the centre of Dublin, Henrietta Suites City Centre provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Popular points of interest near the apartment include The City Hall, Dublin Castle and Chester Beatty Library. The nearest airport is Dublin Airport, 8 km from Henrietta Suites City Centre.

name: The Shelbourne, Autograph Collection
description: The Shelbourne Hotel is the most prestigious and historic 5-star luxury hotel in Dublin. For almost 200 years, it has stood at the centre of Ireland’s capital, looking out over the beautiful St. Stephen’s Green and surrounded by the main cultural and historical sites and shopping areas of the city of Dublin. Magnificently restored and majestically conducted, our 5-star, city centre hotel offers exquisitely appointed guest rooms, spectacular meeting spaces and a tempting choice of menus, bars and lounges. The exceptional range of amenities includes an opulent luxury spa, beauty salon, gentlemen’s barbershop and health club with a swimming pool, as well as an in-house florist. We look forward to making your stay simply remarkable at our iconic 5-star hotel in the heart of Dublin city centre.Marriott

name: Maldron Hotel Tallaght
description: Maldron Hotel & Leisure Centre Tallaght offers complimentary leisure centre access. Located on the N81 road, beside the Tallaght Stadium, it is a 3-minute walk from a Luas stop, which offers a 30-minute ride to central Dublin. All rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a bath, a hair dryer and a desk. Each room includes a private bathroom with a shower. Just across from Shamrock Rovers football stadium, the modern and stylish Maldron Hotel is only a moment's walk from a Luas light rail station ('Tallaght',) and the Square Shopping Centre. The onsite leisure centre boasts a fully equipped gym, a 20-metre swimming pool with hydro jets, and a steam room. It also includes a hot tub, an aerobics studio, and a sauna. Overlooked by the Dublin Mountains, the stylish Maldron Hotel & Leisure Centre Tallaght offers a conference centre which spans 2 floors and is home to 10 private rooms. The largest can accommodate 275 people.

name: Modern City Centre Rooms
description: Modern City Centre Rooms provides accommodation located 1.5 km from the centre of Dublin and features a terrace and a shared lounge. Complimentary WiFi is providedthroughout the property. The bed and breakfast offers a picnic area. Popular points of interest near Modern City Centre Rooms include The Convention Centre Dublin, Connolly Train Station and EPIC The Irish Emigration Museum. The nearest airport is Dublin Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Annandale House
description: Located in Dublin's residential area of Drumcondra, the Annandale House is just 10 minutes' bus ride from the city centre's O'Connell Street. Dublin Airport and the M50 motorway are just a 10-minute drive away. Situated 3.1 kilometres from Dublin city centre and from the famous Temple Bar district, Annandale House offers rooms with free parking and free Wi-Fi. Each room at the family-run Annandale House features an en suite bathroom with free toiletries, tea/coffee making facilities, a TV, ironing facilities, and garden views. Conveniently located for Croke Park Stadium 2 and half kilometres away, our house also offers easy access to Dublin Ferry Port and Dublin's coast line are just 15 minutes’ away.

name: Mount Pleasant Country House
description: Situated in Lucan, Mount Pleasant Country House offers accommodation with a hot tub. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property. There is also a kitchen in some of the units equipped with a microwave and fridge. Cycling and fishing can be enjoyed nearby. St. Edmundsbury Hospital is 600 metres from the country house, while Primrose Hill is an 8-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Dublin Airport, 16 km from the property.

name: The College Green Hotel Dublin, Autograph Collection
address: at College Green, Westmoreland Street, Dublin D02 HR67
description: In the heart of historic Dublin and overlooking Trinity College, the The College Green Dublin Hotel, Autograph Collection offers 5-star luxury close to Grafton Street and the Luas tramline. Set in a historic former bank, it offers spacious rooms with 49-inch HD TVs. Luxurious rooms at the Westin all boast signature Westin Heavenly Beds, along with in-room movies and satellite channels on the LCD TV. Guests can relax with deluxe toiletries, cosy bathrobes, and tea/coffee in the room. Some rooms have a balcony or overlook the glass atrium. Dining experiences at The The College Green Dublin Hotel, Autograph Collection include the elegant Atrium Lounge, offering lunch, afternoon tea and dinner. Morelands Grill is a contemporary grill restaurant serving breakfast, lunch and dinner. The largest room, The Banking Hall, has been restored to its original 19th-century magnificence. The bustling tourist district of Temple Bar is a 5-minute walk from The Westin. The vibrant and central O’Connell Street is also 5 minutes’ walk away, and the hotel is located at the end of Grafton Street, with its numerous shops.

name: White Sands Hotel
description: White Sands is a deluxe, family-run hotel located in the picturesque coastal village of Portmarnock in County Dublin. It offers a lively Irish pub and free Wi-Fi for all guests. Many rooms overlook the Irish Sea. Golfers will be spoilt for choice as some of Dublin’s leading and most prestigious courses surround the hotel. Dublin Airport can be reached with a 20-minute drive, while the centre of Dublin is less than 10 minutes’ drive away. Each room at White Sands Hotel comes with tea and coffee making facilities. There is also a work table, room safe and a private bathroom with free toiletries. Some rooms offer views over Portmarnock Beach. The hotel is situated within a short drive from the heritage fishing villages of Malahide and Howth, both of which offer panoramic sea views and scenic walks. Free parking is available on site.

name: Springfield Hotel
address: Leixlip Road Leixlip W23 W280 IE, Leixlip
description: Just a 15-minute drive from Dublin’s centre, The Springfield Hotel is situated in the centre of Leixlip. It offers free parking, and a modern restaurant serving hearty cuisine. A regular, public service Airport Hopper Bus, is available. With free Wi-Fi, each bright modern room at The Springfield Hotel includes a private bathroom and hairdryer. Free tea and coffee is provided in each room, along with flat-screen cable TV. Full Irish breakfasts are served each day in the modern restaurant, with its relaxing atmosphere, large portions, and Sunday lunches. Guests can also enjoy eating at the bar and carvery. Dublin Airport can be reached in 15 minutes by car, and 2 golf courses are less than 10 minutes' drive away. The M4 motorway is located just 5 minutes’ drive from the hotel.

name: Dylan Hotel
description: Stunning, chic décor and spacious rooms with Italian marble bathrooms are offered at this 5-star boutique hotel. Dylan is located just a 10-minute walk from the RDS and the Aviva Stadium. With luxurious beds and linen, each beautiful room provides a plasma-screen TV. Guests can enjoy an in-room movie menu, free Wi-Fi, and complimentary mineral water. Spacious rooms are individually designed and boast opulent furnishings and memory foam mattresses. Professional hairdryers and foot spas are available on request. The Eddison Restaurant serves gourmet Bistro-style cuisine using the finest of Irish ingredients. The Dylan Bar overlooks the restaurant and has a fine selection of cocktails, wines and an outside terrace area. Room service is also available. Trinity College and St Stephens Green are both under one mile from the Dylan Hotel. Dublin Castle and the 3 Arena are less than a 5-minute drive away.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Dublin City Centre
description: Explore the city from our family-friendly Hilton Garden Inn Dublin City Centre hotel, just 5 minutes from the heart of the city. You’ll be within walking distance to a variety of public transportation options as well as dining, shopping and businesses. Stroll down Grafton Street – Ireland’s most famous shopping street. Unwind in a spacious room with large, comfortable beds, a 40-inch HDTV, mini-refrigerator and laptop safe. Get work done with complimentary WiFi in your room while seated at the workstation with ergonomic chair. Dine at Oly’s Bar & Restaurant, our on-site bar and restaurant. Food is served throughout the day until 10pm with options for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The kids will enjoy a menu designed just for them. Enjoy a pint of Guinness at the comfortable bar while watching sports on the large screen TVs. Stay committed to your workout routine in the fitness centre with cardio equipment and free weights. Be productive in the business center with complimentary WiFi and printing.Hilton

name: Retro Camper Hire
description: Ford Transit – 2.5 Diesel 5 speed manual RHD Sleeps 4 – Travels 4 Electric controlled Bluetooth heating system Gas cooker Sink 3 way fridge 12v / 240v / Gas 21″ Smart TV 15 ltr fresh water tank capacity 12v socket x 1 230v socket x 2 All prices quoted include insurance. The insurance covers standard liability only. A €1500 security deposit is taken and then returned after the vehicle is returned back with no damage to the vehicle. It can take up to 28 days for security deposit to be returned. In most cases its returned within 48 hours. If the vehicle is returned damaged the driver is responsible for the first €1500 of repair costs. Pick up and and drop off time: 11am unless otherwise agreedExpedia

name: Schoolhouse Hotel
description: Welcome to Schoolhouse, an enchanting and historic hotel in the heart of Ballsbridge, just a 10- minute walk from Dublin's bustling city center. Our meticulously restored & recently renovated 1859 schoolhouse building exudes a charming, warm ambiance, offering a truly unique experience. At Schoolhouse, we've crafted the perfect recipe for a memorable stay. Whether you're a food enthusiast seeking relaxed gastro delights or fancy a more formal dining experience, we've got it all. Plus, there's a spacious garden terrace for you to enjoy. Our kitchen is always bustling, serving from 7am until late at night in our gastrobar. It's the perfect spot for friends, family, and colleagues to gather right in the heart of Dublin. Our accommodation merges history with modernity. Within our beautifully renovated rooms, you'll discover comfort and style. Rumor has it that we boast the finest hotel beds in Dublin, ensuring you enjoy a restful night's sleep. For guests with a keen eye for entertainment and exciting events or those here for business, we're perfectly situated for all endeavors. Schoolhouse is walking distance to the RDS, the 3Arena, Dublin’s prime business addresses, Grand Canal Dock and last (but not least) the iconic Aviva Stadium. If you're looking to explore the city further, you'll find the Dart and bus services within a brief 3-minute walk. And for your convenience, our hotel is an official stop for the Aircoach which services the airport, departing and collecting every 15 minutes, every day. As our guest, you can also take advantage of our complimentary on-site parking (subject to availability). Schoolhouse, a hidden gem in the heart of leafy Ballsbridge.

name: Royal Marine Hotel
description: The Royal Marine overlooks Dublin Bay and has direct access to Dun Laoghaire Promenade and Pier. It boasts a health club, spa, indoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. There is a DART train line just 2 minutes walk from the Royal Marine, which has regular services to Dublin City. From outside the hotel there is a coach service to and from Dublin Airport. The Pier Health Club has a steam room, spa bath and free weights. A range of indulgent treatments are on offer at the Sansana Spa including a rock sauna, a mud room and experience showers. Designed over 2 floors, Hardys Bar offers fine cuisine in a modern environment. The Dun Bistro has stunning harbor views and serves modern European cuisine. There are plenty of beautiful coastal and countryside walks, including Peoples Park, in the immediate vicinity. Free parking is available at the hotel. Notable former guests include Charlie Chaplin and Queen Victoria.

name: Beaumont House
description: Situated in Beaumont and with Croke Park Stadium reachable within 3.9 km, Beaumont House features a restaurant, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star inn offers a shared kitchen and an ATM. Connolly Train Station is 4.7 km away and The Convention Centre Dublin is 5.3 km from the inn. At the inn, rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. EPIC The Irish Emigration Museum is 5.3 km from Beaumont House, while 3Arena is 5.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dublin Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Beechtree House
address: 37 Weston Drive Lucan, Co. Dublin, Dublin
description: Beechtree House has garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, set in Dublin, 13 km from Phoenix Park. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. Buffet and continental breakfast options are available every morning at the bed and breakfast. Beechtree House features a garden and sun terrace. Kilmainham Gaol is 13 km from the accommodation, while Heuston Train Station is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dublin, 19 km from Beechtree House, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Gallary
description: Located in Dublin and with Croke Park Stadium reachable within 1.3 km, The Gallary provides express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFithroughout the property and a terrace. Featuring room service, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. The accommodation features a shared kitchen, full-day security and luggage storage for guests. All units are equipped with an oven, microwave, a kettle, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. The rooms include a shared bathroom, free toiletries and bed linen. Glasnevin Cemetery Museum is 1.6 km from the guest house, while Connolly Train Station is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Dublin Airport, 6 km from The Gallary.

name: Mount Barker
description: Set in Swords, within 13 km of Portmarnock Golf Club and 14 km of Croke Park Stadium, MOUNT BARKER offers accommodation with a garden and as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is situated 16 km from St. Michan's Church, 16 km from 3Arena and 16 km from Glasnevin Cemetery Museum. The property is non-smoking and is located 16 km from Connolly Train Station. The units come with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, dishwasher, a coffee machine, a walk-in shower, a hair dryer and a desk. All rooms come with a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms here will provide you with a terrace and some have inner courtyard views. At the guest house every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Jameson Distillery is 16 km from MOUNT BARKER, while National Botanic Gardens is 16 km away. The nearest airport is Dublin Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Pembroke Townhouse
description: No description found

name: The Lodge guesthouse
description: Located in Brittas, The Lodge guesthouse provides free WiFi, and guests can enjoy a garden, a shared lounge and a terrace. Some units also have a kitchen equipped with a fridge, an oven, and a microwave. Hiking can be enjoyed nearby. The Square Tallaght is 11 km from the lodge, while St. Stephen's Green is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Dublin Airport, 33 km from The Lodge guesthouse.

name: Cosy and modern Bedroom in the heart of Dublin
description: No description found

name: Dublin airport
description: Dublin airport is located in Dublin, within 7.3 km of National Botanic Gardens and 7.4 km of The Convention Centre Dublin. The property is around 6.9 km from Connolly Train Station, 7 km from EPIC The Irish Emigration Museum and 7.2 km from Glasnevin Cemetery Museum. The property is non-smoking and is situated 5.3 km from Croke Park Stadium. With a shared bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, rooms at the guest house also boast free WiFi. Trinity College is 7.8 km from Dublin airport, while Irish Whiskey Museum is 7.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dublin Airport, 4 km from the accommodation.

name: Waterloo House
description: No description found

name: 20 Minutes to the City
description: Set in Artane, within 5 km of Croke Park Stadium and 5.6 km of Connolly Train Station, 20 Minutes to the City offers accommodation with a garden and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is around 6.2 km from EPIC The Irish Emigration Museum, 6.3 km from 3Arena and 7.8 km from Glasnevin Cemetery Museum. The property is non-smoking and is located 6.2 km from The Convention Centre Dublin. At the guest house, every room is fitted with a wardrobe. The shared bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At 20 Minutes to the City the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Merrion Square is 7.8 km from the accommodation, while National Botanic Gardens is 7.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dublin Airport, 8 km from 20 Minutes to the City.
